whole_letter:
Dr. Emily Johnson
XYZ Eye Clinic
123 Main St, Suite 101
City, State, 12345
June 25, 2024

Dr. Mark Stevens
Neurology Associates
456 Oak Ave, Suite 202
City, State, 67890

Dear Dr. Stevens,

I am referring Mr. John Smith, a 45-year-old male, for urgent evaluation of optic nerve swelling. Mr. Smith presented with severe headaches, blurred vision, and transient visual obscurations over the past month.

**Referral Reason:**
Examination revealed bilateral optic nerve swelling with indistinct margins. Visual acuity was 20/60 bilaterally. Baseline blood tests (CBC, ESR, CRP) were normal. An MRI of the brain and orbits has been scheduled to investigate potential intracranial causes.

Your expertise is needed to determine the underlying etiology and manage his condition to prevent further complications.

Best regards,
Dr. Emily Johnson
XYZ Eye Clinic
referral_content: Examination revealed bilateral optic nerve swelling with indistinct margins. Visual acuity was 20/60 bilaterally. Baseline blood tests (CBC, ESR, CRP) were normal. An MRI of the brain and orbits has been scheduled to investigate potential intracranial causes.
